com.netflix.servo.publish
Interface MetricObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
AsyncMetricObserver, BaseMetricObserver, CloudWatchMetricObserver, CounterToRateMetricTransform, FileMetricObserver, MemoryMetricObserver
public interface MetricObserver

Observer that receives updates about metrics.

Method Summary
 String getName()
          Name associated with an observer.
 void update(List<Metric> metrics)
          Invoked with the most recent values for a set of metrics.
 

Method Detail

update

void update(List<Metric> metrics)
Invoked with the most recent values for a set of metrics.

getName

String getName()
Name associated with an observer. Mostly used to make log messages more informative.
